Headline: Temporary Westbound Reroute near Devon/Sacramento
ShortDescription: Westbound 155 Devon buses are temp. rerouted via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie, Devon, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Devon/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie, Devon, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Devon/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare- Bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Damen
ShortDescription: O'Hare- Bound Blue Line trains are standing at Damen due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- Bound Blue Line trains are standing at Damen due to a mechanical problem.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. 

Consider using the #50 Damen.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
